items.sentence: I think it\'s highly unlikely that Tom will be allowed to keep the gold that he found.
Tom laughed at some of Mary\'s jokes, but he thought some of them weren\'t very funny.
Tom could tell by the smile on Mary\'s face that she had had a good time at the party.
Tom couldn\'t completely rule out the possibility that he might be laid off from work.
Tom arrived at the train station just as his train was pulling away from the platform.
I don\'t know what else Tom told you, but I do know he doesn\'t always tell the truth.
Tom and Mary were walking down the path with fishing poles slung over their shoulders.
Tom broke up with Mary before her birthday, so he wouldn\'t have to buy her a present.
Where else are you going to find a guitar of this quality for such a reasonable price?
Tom didn\'t want to risk his friendship with Mary by trying to turn it into a romance.
